full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,MTHU CHEN DGRA LHA CHEN PO MCHED DGU'I GSOL MCHOD DGRA LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,CES DPAL GSANG BA'I BDAG PO'I SDOD DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I BSRUNG MA MTHU RTZAL CAN DGRA LHA CHEN PO MCHED DGU'I GSOL MCHOD DGRA LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NA, ,JING GIR GNAS KYI RIGS RGYUD STOBS 'BYOR MNGA' THANG GIS MNGON PAR MTHONG ZHING, ,BLA MA DKON MCHOG LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD GUS DANG LDAN PA THU SA LAG CHI HUNG THA'I JI TSE DBANG RDO RJE LAGS NAS, RGYAL BLON 'BANGS DU MA'I LHA GSOL GYI DON DU PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS BSKUL MA NAN CHER MDZAD PA LTAR, MKHAS GRUB DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA'I RGYAL KHAMS PA ^BADZRA K'I RTIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM @016B DPYOD YANGS PA'I SLOB BU DGE TSUL BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO'I, ,'DIS KYANG DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I LHA BSRUNG MTHU STOBS CAN RNAMS KYIS RTAG TU 'OG ZHING STONGS GROGS MDZAD DE BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PA RGYA CHER THOGS SHING BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS PHYOGS KUN TU KHYAB PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,
